item.title: Vandalised street sign x 2, 31st August
item.description:
We are continuing to have our area vandalised by a minority that think this is OK. It isn't. Two street signs have been vandalised and look terrible. Please repair as not all of us want our area looking so run down. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Sandway Road, Poverest, Orpington, London
